TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LongValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于确保 `long` （64位有符号整数）满足特定条件。The is used to ensure a `long` (a 64-bit signed integer) meets specific criteria. 在创建 类的实例时，将建立用于验证的条件。The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the class is created. 构造函数可确保所验证的 `long` 值符合最小值和最大长度。The constructor ensures that the `long` value that is being validated adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length. 构造函数同时检查 的最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否为排他。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 构造函数检查前面的三个参数，还检查 的值是否与特定的解决值相等。The constructor checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution value. 方法确定所验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型匹配。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 要验证的对象将作为 方法的参数进行传递。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数时，它将同时检查 的最小值和最大值，以及验证范围是否为排他。When the constructor is used, it checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 如果 `rangeIsExclusive` 参数设置为 `true`，则 值不得介于 `minValue` 和 `maxValue`之间。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between `minValue` and `maxValue`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定 `resolution`时，验证的 值必须等于该值才能通过验证。When you specify the `resolution`, the value being validated must be equal to that value in order to pass validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含验证 对象必需的规则。The class contains the rules necessary to validate an object. 创建 类的实例时，将建立规则。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要验证的对象将作为 方法的参数进行传递。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
